EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, It’s up to you. I am happy to do it for you. I will do it this time so you can see an example. Thanks!Sara From: Tom Glatt [mailto:tglatt@glattconsulting.com] Sent: Monday, June 04, 2012 1:29 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: USC question Sara, Should I be entering the invoices for USC, or is that something you will do? Can't remember my level of responsibility. Thanks!Tom -- Thomas Glatt, Jr.Glatt ConsultingTel: (888) 217-5988 x801Twitter: @tglattLinkedIn: http://www.linkedin.com/in/tomglatt <http://www.linkedin.com/in/tomglatt> Distinctive strategy consulting for credit union leaders.
